# screenFrame(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the screen frame containing the window is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func screenFrame(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> CGRect
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context associated with the running web extension.

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGRectNull] if not implemented.
